document.full_text: it never hurts to praise the boss, so when "the celebrity apprentice" contestant la toya jackson talks about the show, among the things she says is that donald "you're fired" trump is really "a wonderful person."
document.title: la toya jackson butters up "apprentice" boss donald trump
lines_and_colors: it never hurts to praise the boss, so when "the celebrity apprentice" contestant la toya jackson talks about the show, among the things she says is that donald "you're fired" trump is really "a wonderful person."
